quotes.quote: Don't make a wish you aren't willing to come true. Don't dream a dream you aren't willing to pursue. Don't love a man you can't say, I do.
If there's a single lesson that life teaches us, it's that wishing doesn't make it so.
Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish.
I wish for sorrow to be a full stop and happiness to be a comma in my life.
A wise woman wishes to be no one's enemy; a wise woman refuses to be anyone's victim.
No one is perfect and everyone wishes they could change something about themselves.
It is hard to contend against one's heart's desire; for whatever it wishes to have it buys at the cost of soul.
May you find grace to do what needs to be done.
May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
How sleep the brave, who sink to rest, By all their country's wishes blest!
When envoys are sent with compliments in their mouths, it is a sign that the enemy wishes for a truce.
Good wishes alone will not ensure peace.
Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
I'm not that rebellious. There's a part of me that wishes I was that.
If you have one wish, wish for everything to be exactly as it is. Then wait patiently for your wish to come true.
Every girl wishes she was Juliet in some version of their life.
But darling, I wish you well On your way to the wishing well
You should never wish for wishful thinking.
With persistent prayer, the desired wish shall be fulfilled.
A man of the world must seem to be what he wishes to be thought.
Whoever wishes peace among peoples must fight statism.
My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
When you wish someone joy, you wish them peace, love, prosperity, happiness. All the good things.
Diligence is the mother of good fortune, and idleness, its opposite, never brought a man to the goal of any of his best wishes.
A wise unselfishness is not a surrender of yourself to the wishes of anyone, but only to the best discoverable course of action.
That is ever the way. Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
